posts.name: Yoqi Song
posts.title: CS Professor
posts.content: Best of luck to all my amazing computer science students as they head into finals week! You've worked hard all semester and I have no doubt you'll crush these exams. Remember, you've got this!

posts.content: Good luck with Valorant game tonight!
